titleStmt.title: Oratio quâ auspicatissimum serenissimi principis Caroli, reditum ex Hispanijs celebrauit Georgius Herbert Academiæ Cantabrigiensis orator
titleStmt.author: Herbert, George, 1593-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ex officina Cantrelli Legge, almæ matris Cantabrigiæ typographi,

notesStmt.note: Possibly intended to be issued with: University of Cambridge. Gratulatio Academiæ Cantabrigiensis de serenissimi principis reditu ex Hispaniis exoptatissimo.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

person.persName: Cantrelli Legge, almæ matris Cantabrigiæ typographi
